packages.name: @quarto-wizard/schema
packages.description: Schema types, parsing, validation, and caching for Quarto extension schemas.
packages.overview:
The `@quarto-wizard/schema` package provides schema functionality for Quarto extensions.
It handles schema type definitions, file parsing, validation, and in-memory caching.

packages.name: @quarto-wizard/snippets
packages.description: Snippet types, parsing, and caching for Quarto extension snippets.
packages.overview:
The `@quarto-wizard/snippets` package provides snippet functionality for Quarto extensions.
It handles snippet type definitions, file parsing, and in-memory caching.

packages.name: @quarto-wizard/core
packages.description: Core library for Quarto extension management.
packages.overview:
The `@quarto-wizard/core` package provides the core functionality for managing Quarto extensions.
It handles archive extraction, filesystem operations, GitHub integration, registry access, and extension lifecycle operations.
